snippet: Chris Brown, like R. Kelly and Usher, has a new album out that invites listeners to parse the songs in search of subtext.
abstract: Jon Caramanica says that the new albums by troubled R&B artists Chris Brown, R Kelly and Usher invite listeners to scavenge the lyrics closely for hints about their inner lives.
lead_paragraph: Chris Brown, like R. Kelly and Usher, has a new album out that invites listeners to parse the songs in search of subtext.

headline.seo: Confessional Music: Chris Brown, Usher and R. Kelly
headline.main: Sifting Through Songs for the Man Underneath
headline.print_headline: Sifting Through Songs For the Man Underneath
